title: New: Born Ruffians – With Her Shadow
content:
Less than a day into 2013 and we’ve already got a new track from Canadian pop-rockers Born Ruffians.

So there’s more than a touch of Razorlight to With Her Shadow, and it’s extremely likely that it’ll find it’s way round the summer festival circuit, but hey, who didn’t enjoy drunkenly bawling America in a sweaty indie club back in ’06….? With their third album currently being recorded and expected later in the year, if the rest of the material is anything like this, they’ll be the talk of your local HMV in no time.
